projects.name: Web Application to predict Skin Disease: An Approach Using Deep Learning Algorithm
projects.summary: Trained a disease prediction model using deep learning techniques, employed transfer learning with a pre-trained ResNet50 Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) algorithm, utilized a comprehensive dataset of 10,000 medical images, and published a research paper in ICHORA conference 2024.
